name: Common Data Scrap
description: A ubiquitous fragment of corrupted data. Essential for basic entity evolution.

name: Uncommon Data Cluster
description: A more complex amalgamation of data, offering greater GHZ.

name: Health Stim Module Mk1
description: A consumable module that restores a small amount of Power (Core HP).

name: Basic Laser Emitter
description: A rudimentary energy weapon. Standard issue for new Data Entities.
